title: Trending Me Softly With His Zeit 6/29: The Sopranos, EuroCup, NBA, Kristi Noem, Tucker Carlson, Fox News
itunes:title: Trending Me Softly With His Zeit 6/29: The Sopranos, EuroCup, NBA, Kristi Noem, Tucker Carlson, Fox News
description:
In this edition of Trending Me Softly With His Zeit, Jack and Miles discuss the Sopranos prequel, a much-needed EuroCupdate, NBA news, Gov. Kristi Noem sending National Guard troops to US-Mexico border, Tucker Carlson being all paranoid, and Fox News having to pay a fine for "wanton human rights violations"

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
